meanings.definition: Arranged in two rows or pairs.
meanings.sent1: The dichasial flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf had a dichasial arrangement of books, making it easy to find what I needed.
meanings.sent3: The dichasial pattern on the wallpaper made the room look like a fancy hotel.
meanings.sent4: Her dichasial hairstyle, with two braids on each side, was the talk of the party.
meanings.sent5: The dichasial layout of the classroom desks allowed for easy group work.

meanings.sent1: The dichasial tree in the park provided ample shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the dichasial plant growing in his field and marveled at its unique structure.
meanings.sent3: The dichasial shrub seemed to be doing a little dance in the breeze with its two branches swaying.
meanings.sent4: The dichasial rose bush stood out in the garden, its double stems making it a rare find.
meanings.sent5: The dichasial cactus had a symmetrical beauty with its two distinct branches.
